entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this afternoon. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
